model.TemplateMethods

Class CaffeinatedDrink

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TemplateMethods.CaffeinatedDrink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrinksStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoffeeStrategy, TeaStrategy

    public abstract class CaffeinatedDrink
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDrinksStrategy
    An abstract template class for caffeinated drinks, e.g. tea and coffee.

      A method for setting the information string for the clients.

      A concrete implementation for common method: pouring drinks.
